text: Rhamphomyia albidiventris is a species of dance flies, in the fly family Empididae. It has a limited distribution. It has been recorded from Great Britain, Germany, Austria, Slovakia, Bosnia, Finland and central Russia. ==References== ==External links== *Fauna Europaea Category:Empididae Category:Asilomorph flies of Europe Category:Insects described in 1898 Category:Taxa named by Gabriel Strobl
title: Rhamphomyia albidiventris
